title: Soon Shyvana, Soon. . .
body:
Just wait a little longer, then FREELO abusers will stop tainting you

After that, we can be one big happy family once again, just you and me. . .

Lets see how much her play rate plummets after 6.6 Patch

sated/botrk for the real mains. all i want is the double hit, the damage isnt going to bother me because i build attackspeed bruiser

I go dev into mallet, followed by either a rageblade or a witts end (sometimes bork).  I started running warlords so I don't necessarily need to get the bork to sustain in fights.  Its really funny to watch people start fights with me, realize they can't win, and then realize they are now gonna get slowed until they die.

what the fuck lmao

does that actually work it sounds terrible in theory but i wanna try it

Its powerful.  Oh I should also mention I run exhaust.  I rely on clever positioning to enter teamfights and once I catch someone they have to flash away or die.  Works pretty well.  

Shyvana can get away with it because she gets more natural resistances than other champions.  I'm usually getting a zzrot to smooth out the resistance, or just getting more of w/e resistance I need.  Its why I really do like witts end, gives a little more magic resist.
Shyvana with exhaust are so easy to get first blood on 2 mins into the game.
any half decent jungler is going to ward their own jungle and watch for early invades. this always works in low elo but the higher you get the less stupid people are.
Higher elo I see people picking up flash more.

it's a personal preference as well as dependent on the matchup you're going into

if i'm against a champ that i know i can counterjungle pre 6 then i will definitely take flash
I don't :T

I've always heard this - along with the whole "Shaco and Eve run Ignite" - and I've always been confused as to why.

Flash is sooooo useful for her to just flash auto Q titanic and get an insta lol

Oh, I just get Distortion CDR boots along with the Insight mastery and have my Flash up every 180s.

I remember an Azir one game must've hated me for having a blink to him (and over his wall) every 3 mins.
{{item:3094}} is so toxic on her
sated titanic is likely still the stronger choice post nerfs though.
I build warrior into Cowsep's full crit build usually. It is more fun than should be allowed.
shes been one of my main champions since season 5, im just disappointed my freelo was discovered and now everyone calls me a freelo abuser whenever i choose to play her.
i know how you feel since the recent discovery of how op shyvana is i feel disgusted when i play her knowing she has been tainted

A: Cancerous Devourer is a problem for two years. What do we do?
B: Let's nerf champions using it!
C: In a way that's completely meaningless and compensate for it, too!
D: How about removing Devourer instead?

_\*D gets thrown out the window*_

that feel when the only shyvana change that went through was the one that shouldn't have... they nerf lane shyvana while barely touching her jungle, and they keep the unnecessary bonus damage to monsters on her W... and still fail to delete devourer from the game :(
and they don't adress her super buggy autoattacks that make her barely playable before getting 40% bonus attack speed
(laning her sucks because of that, you can't autoattack your enemy if he's walking away from you because your auto cancels if he walks out of range during the animation... only champ in the game that does that AFAIK)

I've heard Illaoi with her W(E? Dunno, don't play her) empowered attack has similar issue, as in people can walk out of it.

Agreed, though.
Riot has a tendency to nerf exactly not the things they should.

This one, Shyvana's, is literally meaningless for her jungling and substantial for her laning, which already is highly underplayed due to the cancerous Devourer.

i think what you're referring to is the same with irelia and fizz Q that you can blink out of the way of the dash and not get hit with the damage (same way you can flash alistar headbutt and not get knocked by it)

>(laning her sucks because of that, you can't autoattack your enemy if he's walking away from you because your auto cancels if he walks out of range during the animation... only champ in the game that does that AFAIK)

thats not entirely true, some tanks have such bad AAs aswell, especially mao and nauti, who both have a strong passive linked to their AAs, though it isn't as obvious as they have the cc to keep oponents in their AA range, but in teamfights it often gets anyoing, even more so vs AS slows.

i don't play maokai so i can't tell for certain, but I can guarantee that nautilus does not suffer from bad autoattacks, even if he swings slowly, he always completes his swing on his opponent even if they dash or blink away, while no one has ever died to a shyvana autoattack or Q after flashing away from her since it automatically cancels her attack and puts her back into idle animation :(

I hear ya. I even called her rise to power months before it happened. It's a good thing the attention spans of most of the people that play this game are so tiny.

It sucks I'm gonna have to max RWQE instead of the usual RWEQ

what... why would u ever max e over q unless your laning and need to farm out of darius's pull???

A gain of aoe ranged 40 magic damage per level vs a gain of single target melee 5% AD ratio per level. 

You're fine doing either, but before the Q nerfs, it was better to max E before Q. That's why they nerfed Q of all things, so maxing E second now drops your damage output instead of making it stronger.

You do you.
Can confirm Q > E works just fine. I got to mastery rank 4 before learning people max E > Q.
It's personal preference. Most people think WEQ is the better order, and until this patch goes through, I'm inclined to agree with them.
at least yi and udyr are getting nerfs =D

Can we just talk about how sassy y'all are about Shyvana, like damn. This is how I feel about Karma, praise the sun nobody realizes how incredibly broken she is. Unfortunately she's getting buffs, which  means LCS players will use her and then she'll be nerfed again unfortunately. But at least I can enjoy her while she lasts.

she getting buffs for like 3 patches in a row, some still say she's not that good... they dont know how wrong they are

but the nerfs will be scary, hope rito forget her like everyone else and just let her keep these buffs =D

Yeah but at the end of the day Karma still has a shit kit and is being pidgeonholed into support. Her kit has no direction because it was made by someone that was completly ignorant to the role Karma had pre-rework.

The buffs wont solve her problems, but at this rate she will eventually get powercreeped or numberbuffed into pick/ban status by numbers alone.

i like the new kit, no one knew what her old kit did (they say 'grab the lantern' but nobody knew about her w speed up or q-heal...), its easier to play (i'm not a 'fan' of solo lane karma) and easier to make an impact good roams (using e to get mov speed and w to snare), meh poke , good to pick enemy out of position (FQC + mov. speed allies + snare enemy), can help peeling (q w someone who wants to get backline, shield mov speed to all allies)

> no one knew what her old kit did

No one knew what Bard did at its release, but he wasnt excluded from free rotations on a whim.

> its easier to play (i'm not a 'fan' of solo lane karma)

Opinion. And Karma was a midlaner before rework, anyone that used her as a support met failure because she needed the gold.

> and easier to make an impact good roams (using e to get mov speed and w to snare),

You can do the same, but better, on champions that can scale better.

> good to pick enemy out of position (FQC + mov. speed allies + snare enemy), can help peeling (q w someone who wants to get backline, shield mov speed to all allies)

This is something most champions can do, specially supports.

Truth is, Karma right now needs to be completly overbuffed to be relevant because her kit is trash.

I don't think her winrate will really sink that far, All they did was reduce her q damage at early levels which didn't really target the one thing she's insanely better at than other champions, which is farming. Also her W does insane damage so not sure why that wasn't nerfed.
The W does insane damage to monsters is what I ment. They removed the 20% increased damage it deals to monsters on pbe for a while, but reverted it for some reason.

They triple nerfed Rengar a couple patches ago, so they definitely can double nerf that op ass champion. Rengar wasn't even that strong before his nerfs :^( at least shyv was strong already when they nerfed her.

She's still strong lol, do people read patch notes? her scaling is just lower mid game, her end game spike is the same. 180/185/190/195/200% total attack damage â‡’ 140/155/170/185/200% total attack damage , to put this in perspective, at level 9 she will be exactly the same lol, still gives some time for her to win up it's an ok nerf but nothing hard.
